snippet: At 7:02 p.m., or just about the time the Philadelphia Flyers and Boston Bruins would have opened the N.H.L. season, a couple hundred fans gathered at a gleaming South Philadelphia sports bar.
abstract: At 7:02 p.m., or just about the time the Philadelphia Flyers and Boston Bruins would have opened the N.H.L. season, a couple hundred fans gathered at a gleaming South Philadelphia sports bar.

headline.main: Opening Day Without the N.H.L.: Back on Broad Street
headline.print_headline: N.H.L. Is Frozen Out, but the Game Goes On: Back on Broad Street
